personal.name: Your Full Name
personal.title: Senior AI Engineer
personal.tagline: Building intelligent systems that solve real-world problems
personal.bio: I'm a passionate AI engineer with 8 years of experience in designing and deploying production-ready AI systems. I specialize in machine learning, natural language processing, and scalable AI architectures. My work focuses on creating AI solutions that are not just innovative, but also practical, maintainable, and impactful.

faqs.question: What's your greatest strength as an AI engineer?
faqs.answer: My ability to bridge the gap between research and production. I don't just build models that work in notebooks - I design systems that are scalable, maintainable, and deliver real business value. I focus on end-to-end solutions: from data pipelines to model deployment to monitoring.

faqs.question: What type of projects excite you most?
faqs.answer: I'm most excited by projects that combine cutting-edge AI technology with practical impact. I love working on systems that leverage LLMs, RAG, and generative AI to solve real user problems. Challenges involving scalability, optimization, and production ML systems particularly energize me.

faqs.question: Are you open to contract/freelance work?
faqs.answer: I'm primarily looking for full-time positions, but I'm open to discussing interesting contract opportunities, especially for AI consulting or building AI products from scratch.

faqs.question: What's your ideal work environment?
faqs.answer: I thrive in collaborative, fast-paced environments where I can both contribute my expertise and learn from talented teammates. I value companies with strong engineering culture, clear communication, and a focus on innovation. Remote or hybrid work is ideal for me.

faqs.question: How do you stay updated with AI advancements?
faqs.answer: I regularly read research papers (especially from arXiv), follow AI communities on Twitter/X and Reddit, experiment with new tools and models, contribute to open source, and attend AI/ML conferences and meetups. I also write technical blog posts to solidify my understanding.
